entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that guard a prison. They have arrived in Little Whinging and are near Harry.

entities.name: little whinging
entities.description: Little Whinging is the location where dementors have arrived.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being guarded by dementors and has thoughts about them.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic may have lost control of the dementors.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison guarded by dementors.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort may have joined forces with the dementors.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore predicted that the dementors would join Voldemort.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a person who has thoughts about Harry and the dementors.

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic may have lost control of the dementors.
Voldemort may have joined forces with the dementors.
Dumbledore predicted that Voldemort would join the dementors.
